common

Class AbstractImageParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.AbstractImageParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeifParser, JpgParser, PngParser, TifParser

    public abstract class AbstractImageParser
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract superclass for implementing image file parsers. Subclasses are responsible for decoding specific image formats (for example, JPEG, PNG, TIFF) and extracting metadata structures.

    This class provides basic file loading and byte-reading utilities, and defines a contract for reading metadata through abstract methods.

    Usage:

    • Subclass this to support format-specific parsing
    • Use readMetadata() to trigger extraction

    Change History:

    • Version 1.0 â€“ Initial release by Trevor Maggs on 9 July 2025
    Since:
    9 July 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

      • readMetadata

        public abstract Metadata<? extends BaseMetadata> readMetadata()
                                                       throws ImageReadErrorException,
                                                              java.io.IOException
        Reads and extracts metadata from the image file.
        Returns:
        a Metadata container with parsed metadata
        Throws:
        ImageReadErrorException - if a parsing error occurs
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read

      • getMetadata

        public abstract Metadata<? extends BaseMetadata> getMetadata()
        Returns processed metadata.
        Returns:
        a populated Metadata object if present, otherwise an empty object
